name: Interlace Bag
description: The Interlace Bag is a small bag with a cabled interlace design. It has a flap that fastens with a button and an optional strap. The finished bag shown measures 8.5”x7”.
full_text: The Interlace Bag is a small bag with a cabled interlace design. It has a flap that fastens with a button and an optional strap. The finished bag shown measures 8.5”x7”. Materials: US size 4 needles cable needle 1 skein 3 weight yarn yarn needle 1 button Gauge: 20 sts x 24 rows in a 4”x4” square of stockinette The gauge isn’t really important for this project. For a larger bag, use larger needles and thicker yarn. In addition to the pattern for the bag, a pattern for just the interlace motif is also available.
